column2:
<!-- KNITR_ASIS_OUTPUT_TOKEN -->
<!-- rnb-source-begin  -->

```r
alphaVir %>%
  filter(!is.na(virus.bin)) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = metric,
              values_from = diversity) -> alphaWide

lmer(data = alphaWide,
     Shannon ~ virus.bin + (sampleloc | patientid)) -> lmVirusAlpha

summary(lmVirusAlpha)

confint(lmVirusAlpha)

# Extract out the parameter estimates and confidence intervals
coef_estimates <-
	tidy(lmVirusAlpha, conf.int = TRUE) %>%
	filter(effect == \fixed\")

```r
alphaVir %>%
  filter(!is.na(virus.bin)) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = metric,
              values_from = diversity) -> alphaWide

lmer(data = alphaWide,
     Shannon ~ virus.bin + (sampleloc | patientid)) -> lmVirusAlpha

summary(lmVirusAlpha)

confint(lmVirusAlpha)

# Extract out the parameter estimates and confidence intervals
coef_estimates <-
	tidy(lmVirusAlpha, conf.int = TRUE) %>%
	filter(effect == \fixed\")
